content: Why is AWS's logo bigger than the other companys on https://foundation.rust-lang.org/members/ ?

I'm not a graphic designer but i think it's a visual "artifact" of being the only logo with a different aspect ratio (more squared than the others).
If you draw a straight line it will become apparent. If you "squeeze" the AWS logo to be the same height as the others the text will become too small
They could definitely use better baseline alignment

submitting a patch is always an option :)
https://github.com/rust-lang/foundation.rust-lang.org
